result_head:
{'ok': True, 'lean_translation': 'import Mathlib
open Set
open Subgroup

/-- If $P$ is a $p$-Sylow subgroup of $G$ and $P \triangleleft G$, prove that $P$ is the only $p$-Sylow subgroup of $G$. -/
theorem unique_p_sylow_of_normalizer_eq_top_ext (G : Type*) [Group G] {p : ℕ} [Fact (Nat.Prime p)]
    [Finite (Sylow p G)] (P : Sylow p G) (hP : P.normalizer = ⊤) :
    Sylow.IsUnique p G := sorry'}

import Mathlib
open Set
open Subgroup

/-- If $P$ is a $p$-Sylow subgroup of $G$ and $P \triangleleft G$, prove that $P$ is the only $p$-Sylow subgroup of $G$. -/
theorem unique_p_sylow_of_normalizer_eq_top_ext (G : Type*) [Group G] {p : ℕ} [Fact (Nat.Prime p)]
    [Finite (Sylow p G)] (P : Sylow p G) (hP : P.normalizer = ⊤) :
    Sylow.IsUnique p G := sorry

theorem unique_p_sylow_of_normalizer_eq_top_ext (G : Type*) [Group G] {p : ℕ} [Fact (Nat.Prime p)]
    [Finite (Sylow p G)] (P : Sylow p G) (hP : P.normalizer = ⊤) :
    Sylow.IsUnique p G := sorry

function.arguments: {"natural_language_statement":"Let G be a finite group and p a prime. Let P : Subgroup G be a p-Sylow subgroup, and suppose Subgroup.Normal P. Then for any other p-Sylow subgroup Q : Subgroup G, Q = P.","history":[{"role":"user","content":"Translate the following and check correctness: If $P$ is a $p$-Sylow subgroup of $G$ and $P \\triangleleft G$, prove that $P$ is the only $p$-Sylow subgroup of $G$.\nSave it to: Herstein_exercise_2_11_6.lean"}]}

args.natural_language_statement: Let G be a finite group and p a prime. Let P : Subgroup G be a p-Sylow subgroup, and suppose Subgroup.Normal P. Then for any other p-Sylow subgroup Q : Subgroup G, Q = P.

history.content:
Translate the following and check correctness: If $P$ is a $p$-Sylow subgroup of $G$ and $P \triangleleft G$, prove that $P$ is the only $p$-Sylow subgroup of $G$.
Save it to: Herstein_exercise_2_11_6.lean

result_head:
{'ok': True, 'lean_translation': 'import Mathlib
open MulAction Subgroup
open Pointwise
open Equiv Equiv.Perm Finset Function List QuotientGroup

/-- If $P$ is a $p$-Sylow subgroup of $G$ and $P \triangleleft G$, prove that $P$ is the only $p$-Sylow subgroup of $G$. -/
theorem unique_p_Sylow_subgroup_of_normalizer_eq_top_extracted [Group G] {p : ℕ} [Fact (Nat.Prime p)] [Finite (Sylow p G)] (P : Sylow p G) :
 (↑P).normalizer = ⊤ → ∀ (Q : Sylow p G), P = Q := sorry'}

import Mathlib
open MulAction Subgroup
open Pointwise
open Equiv Equiv.Perm Finset Function List QuotientGroup

/-- If $P$ is a $p$-Sylow subgroup of $G$ and $P \triangleleft G$, prove that $P$ is the only $p$-Sylow subgroup of $G$. -/
theorem unique_p_Sylow_subgroup_of_normalizer_eq_top_extracted [Group G] {p : ℕ} [Fact (Nat.Prime p)] [Finite (Sylow p G)] (P : Sylow p G) :
 (↑P).normalizer = ⊤ → ∀ (Q : Sylow p G), P = Q := sorry
